title: Force exerted by spring after system is at rest

content.description: In the system of two blocks and a spring shown above, blocks 1 and 2 are connected by a string that passes over a pulley. The initially unstretched spring connects block 1 to a rigid wall. Block 1 is released from rest, initially slides to the right, and is eventually brought to rest by the spring and by friction on the horizontal surface.
content.question: After block 1 comes to rest, the force exerted on it by the spring must be equal in magnitude to

choices.label: the vector sum of the forces on block 1 due to friction and tension in the string
the sum of the weights of the two blocks
the difference in the weights of the two blocks

content.answer: the vector sum of the forces on block 1 due to friction and tension in the string

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
